source.text:
nameExists = False

inputName = input(“Please enter your login name.”)
for index = <<<0 to users.length – 1>>>

<<<nameExists = True>>>
endif
next index
if <<<nameExists == False then>>>
print(“That login name does not exist.”)
endif
endwhile
